name: BA CityFlyer Embraer 190, London City - Glasgow (No landing)
description:
Snapchat: pauls_trips
Twitter: @pauls_trips

This video doesn't have a landing on it - because of fog in Glasgow, we were instructed to turn off all electrical equipment while the aircraft performed an autoland using the ILS. But you can still enjoy a (shorter) trip report complete with airport highlights, takeoff, onboard service and landing....

(sorry for the fog!)

Thanks for watching, and don't forget to subscribe!
